reviews.text: My husband and I stayed at this hotel for two nights to attend a family wedding. We were very pleased with the room, facilities, and the front desk staff. In particular, we were delighted with the indoor pool, sauna, and hot tubs. No restaurant but one across the side street in another hotel that had meals that were fine.
reviews.title: Best Hotel in Hearst

reviews.text: For a motel on the highway, this place was incredible. Rooms were clean, salt water pool was sparkling, staff was incredible. Loved it so much, that we stayed again on our home too!
reviews.title: What a deal!
